job.title: .Net Developer - Senior
job.description: ltulgtltligtReady to make an impact If so please read onltbrgtltligtltulgtWe know you know GEICO But you should get to know us for great careers too And right now were looking for a ltstronggtltstronggtSenior NET Software Developerltstronggtltstronggt to start a GEICO career in Chevy Chase MD Our applications are undergoing rapid modernization efforts to develop new technologies moving to new Cloud infrastructure and rolling out DevOps processes Youll apply your NET software development skills on a team with top honors in web and mobile development and innovate for over 15 million policyholdersltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAt GEICO its not just a job its growth and opportunityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtTheres one thing our associates all have in common they found a career they never expected With coaching and mentoring you will find your position as a ltstronggtSenior NET Software Developerltstronggt can become a career in the most unexpected and rewarding waysltbrgtltulgtltligtWith most of our programs and software being connected to the NET platform you have a tremendous opportunity to make an impact at GEICOltligtltligtYoull be exposed to senior management while working on high profile challenging projectsltbrgtltligtltulgtltemgtThere are so many avenues of professional development at GEICO including user groups mentorship technology classes and development programs Jasmine J GEICO Associate since 2015ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtltugtTeaming Up With Programmers Developers Scrum Masters Leads Managers And Directors You WillltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggtGet ready to join a company you can believe in and work alongside a team of associates who careltbrgtltulgtltligtDeliver firstclass software that solves real business problemsltligtltligtPerform advancedlevel application analysis design development unit testing and implementation activitiesltligtltligtProvide input and feedback to others on topics of architecture design code quality and business solutionsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtWe are looking for people with results they are proud of such asltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligtBachelors degree in Computer Science or a technical fieldltligtltligtFour plus years of experience in full NET software development especially in the areas of Visual Studio TFS C SQL Server WCF ASPNET MVC Web API LINQ SOAP and RESTltligtltligtFour plus years of experience with application design implementation maintenance diagnosingcorrecting issues managing security vulnerabilities and maintaining compliance with industry security standards under minimal directionltligtltligtFour plus years of development in a largescale multiplatform environment is requiredltligtltligtExperience in Agile Application Development ampamp Scrum methodologies is preferredltligtltligtResearch and evaluate new software frameworks and techniques to provide recommendations to the divisionltligtltligtMentor less experienced NET developers while providing training and performing code reviewsltligtltligtPassionate about software development and delivering high quality applicationsltligtltligtExcellent communication problem solving and analytical skills is a mustltligtltligtMust possess a strong sense of ownership responsibility and initiativeltligtltligtFlexibility to balance multiple assignments in a fastpaced environmentltligtltligtAbility to work independently yet function as an integral part of a teamltbrgtltligtltulgtDIDPltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtBenefitsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtAs a full time associate youll enjoy our Total Rewards Program to help secure your financial future and preserve your health and wellbeing includingltbrgtltulgtltligtPremier Medical Dental and Vision Insurance with no waiting periodltligtltligtPaid Vacation Sick and Parental Leaveltligtltligt401k Plan with Profit SharingltligtltligtTuition ReimbursementltligtltligtPaid Training and LicensuresltligtltligtBenefits may be different by location Benefit eligibility requirements vary and may include length of serviceltligtltligtCoverage begins with the pay period after hire date Must enroll in New Hire Benefits within 30 days of the date of hire for coverage to take effectltbrgtltligtltulgtThe safety of our associates both current and future is GEICOs highest priority At this time most of our associates are working remotely due to the current COVID19 pandemic Candidates who are selected for this position will be trained remotely and must be able to work from home in a designated work area Once GEICO determines it is safe for associates to return to the office candidates may be required to work in our Chevy Chase MD officeltbrgtltbrgtThe equal employment opportunity policy of the GEICO Companies provides for a fair and equal employment opportunity for all associates and job applicants regardless of race color religious creed national origin ancestry age gender pregnancy sexual orientation gender identity marital status familial status disability or genetic information in compliance with applicable federal state and local law GEICO hires and promotes individuals solely on the basis of their qualifications for the job to be filledltbrgtltbrgtGEICO reasonably accommodates qualified individuals with disabilities to enable them to receive equal employment opportunity andor perform the essential functions of the job unless the accommodation would impose an undue hardship to the Company This applies to all applicants and associates GEICO also provides a work environment in which each associate is able to be productive and work to the best of their ability We do not condone or tolerate an atmosphere of intimidation or harassment We expect and require the cooperation of all associates in maintaining an atmosphere free from discrimination and harassment with mutual respect by and for all associates and applicantsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggt
